missions.instruction: Open https://www.ycombinator.com/companies. Find one recent startup from the current batch, extract the company name, one-line description, and founders, then save those fields as a JSON file.
missions.description: Extract a YC startup listing from the public companies index.

missions.instruction: Navigate to https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/login, authenticate with the demo credentials, and capture the 'You logged into a secure area!' banner as both text and a screenshot.
missions.description: Drive the Heroku sample login flow and collect the secure area proof.

missions.instruction: Open the docs/artifacts/heroku_sample/run_summary.md file locally, summarize the current demo status, and save the summary as summary.json in the artifacts folder.
missions.description: Audit the packaged demo artifacts without touching external sites.
